website_summaries.verdict: While it costs a bit more than it should, the DualShock 3 adds the rumble support that should've been present in the PS3 from the beginning.
pros: Wireless PS3 controller with rumble support
slightly heavier, which gives it a bit more heft than the featherlight Sixaxis controller
rumble function added to many existing games via downloadable patches
cons: doesn't come with a USB cable for recharging

customer_reviews.title: The controller was faulty and advertised as tested and works great.
customer_reviews.text: The controller was absolute junk. The paper that came with it says that it was "tested and works great" This controller was in fact filthy, the buttons would stick, and when you would press certain buttons such as the triangle, it would activate other buttons not even near the one you pressed. The controller was clearly not tested, or they knowingly lied to me. I will not be buying anything else from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge!  Useless!
customer_reviews.text: This controller seemed to work fine but immediately started losing it's charge quicker than my other two black controllers. I don't think color plays into this. Maybe I just got a lemon. But mine won't hold a charge for even two hours at this point. Meanwhile, the original and an extra still hold a charge all day long. They are both older controllers of course. I normally don't give too many 1 star reviews. But in this case, the controller is useless. If I want a 3rd one, I'm going to have to buy another one. I probably would refrain from the red ones since I've had bad luck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last at all
customer_reviews.text: Granted I did by a refirbished controller I expected it to work longer than just a few months. I have a ps4 that I mainly play and only needed a new controller for my ps3 so I could play some of my old games as I lost my old controller somehow. Within months the D-Pad began pressing itself when I only used it for about maybe 10-15 play sessions and I'm being generous. I bought it to play Tom Clancy's End War, RUSE, and Civilization Revolution all being heavy D-Pad usage games and now I can't even do that with this controller.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this controller for over 3 years now, and it has held up nicely. We had two PS3's and so we needed a second controller for each. I ordered this one and a Pink one. Years later I still have 4 working controllers and all of them hold a charge. The controller is exactly like the original PlayStation 3 controller that comes with the PS3, only the color is red. Other people seem to be having issues with getting knock offs - I ordered mine directly from amazon, not a 3rd party - and mine is an authentic Sony controller.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenskya

customer_reviews.title: NOT A SONY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what the seller claims, this is not made by Sony. Does it work? Yes. No vibration though, like on the Sony controllers. Blue one is genuine Sony, red one is what they sold here. It's a close copy and since Sony isn't making them anymore you have to do what you have to do. One star for fraud.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great extra (or replacement) PS3 Controller!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a non-Dualshock 3 controller that I received with my launch-window 60GB PS3. The controller's left analog stick had begun to stick in place, and it was becoming quite frustrating to use. So, I pulled the trigger on this red Dualshock 3, and it arrived a few days later (thank you, Prime!). I charged it up, and pairing with the PS3 worked first try. Not much more I can say here.. great product! The red color is a nice change of pace from the traditional black.
customer_reviews.author: Craig L.

customer_reviews.title: arrived very fast. its a good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a new controller last night because i found my old one was very worn down from all the usage from the past years. it hadnt affected my gaming before until today when i was running from a monster with a chainsaw. this is a good controller for the price. i was going to buy a cheaper 3rd party one but my experience with those have been eh. theres always something lacking in them. either triggers are too tight or analog stick is too stiff. atleast this, i get what i paid for but at a better price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Battery
customer_reviews.text: Works as well, if not better than the controller that came with the system. It definintly has a longer battery life than my orginal controller. I did buy three years after I bought the system, so it may very well just be a newer model, but either way, I am plenty happy with the result. I had actually bought and expected it to come with a cable to plug into the PS3, so that was disappointing, but otherwise it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Wiedow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller after the one we had before had broke. I was very happy with the price compared to the local store pricing. I love the colors and the controller is light weight and easy to use and move around. There is nothing to dislike about it. It has worked well for our household and has been a quality product. I definitely would recommend purchasing this on Amazon instead of the local store.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: Worked like it should for two years
customer_reviews.text: Worked like it should for two years. The battery is shot now. Feels good but kinda looked like a cheap knockoff, pretty sure it was Sony original product though. As hard as the kids are on the controller's, I'm pretty happy it lasted this long.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a month, but now
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with a gift card I got for my birthday. The R and L sticks were loose right out of the box but I didn't think much of it. Cut to a month later and whatever sensor the R stick is attached to has bouts of moving up on its own, causing characters in games I'm playing to start looking or aiming upwards without my control. Since the return window has closed I guess I'll be keeping it, but only to use when I'm charging the other one (still in working order after four years) and I'm watching Netflix or something. Horribly disappointed and a waste of a perfectly good gift card.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These controllers are great, they are the sony brand so you won't find a better quality controller. Out of the box it feels comfortable in the hand, it's not too small like some other brands. The price is awesome as well seeing as they're still going for about $60 in stores so you save quite a bit of money. The only thing that might be a little annoying is that it doesn't come with a usb charging cable. You will also need to charge it before you use it because the batteries on these are about dead when you get them but the charge lasts for hours. Overall this is the best deal you will find anywhere for these controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Jerred

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at my fair share of controllers online at both Amazon and Game Stop, as well as others such as Best Buy before making a selection. I read some reviews on a different brand of controllers that I cannot recollect at the moment and I just made sure that whatever I was going to buy was a Playstation controller, nothing else. This product was just that and my boyfriend loved this, it being his favorite color and especially being fully functional after slamming his old one while playing Dark Souls..... but that's another story. I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: onesheep

customer_reviews.title: great controller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this controller a year ago after my original one started to die. It was packaged well and worked great when I first bought it and is still working perfectly a year and month later even after a few throws to the ground in fits of gaming rage. Girlfriend also just bought a pink one of the same type and hers is also working well although only a few months old. This is a little expensive compared to some of the generic ones but I'd rather pay for the quality. I couldn't handle jumping from roof to roof in Assassin's Creed II with my character always veering slightly to the left thanks to the original controller.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Not original controllers, they work ok, but there is a marked difference between the controllers that I have purchased from local stores and these controllers. The case might be original Sony, but the rest of it is knock off garbage. I have had these for about six months and I have to press the PS3 button, then the X button then the triangle button to get it to connect. They also power off if you walk away for more than five minutes. They work, but not at all as described or what I expected. You get what you paid for and I didn't pay much so that's what I got...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Plant

customer_reviews.title: Died within a year.
customer_reviews.text: It was great when I got it. Then sometime later the vibration stopped, and then it couldn't hold a charge, and finally it died. It was a slow progression death but this controller didn't even last me a year, and for the price it was at, seriously? Not worth it. Do they even quality test these things?
customer_reviews.author: Kizu Rai

customer_reviews.title: Good controller - case slightly less opaque than expected
customer_reviews.text: After realizing I was losing a lot of FPS battles due to increasingly unresponsive joysticks on my original PS3 controller, I decided to get this replacement controller. The joysticks are now as responsive as I remember when I first got my PS3. After a few days of use the battery life seems satisfactory. The red status light seems to shine through the red case, though. I didn't realize how opaque my previous black PS3 controller was
customer_reviews.author: A0A2 95AB DC34 69C9

customer_reviews.title: Transparent Red PS3 Controller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday. (Age 29). I ordered it in solid red. The unit I received was TRANSPARENT RED, not solid as in the photo. I gave it to him anyway, & he was ok with it. Rather liked it. If not, it was going back. Surprised that they switched out an item on me without telling me. My son was happy with it in the end, so all's well.
customer_reviews.author: Third Grade Teacher

customer_reviews.title: This Sony playstation controller does exactly what it is supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: This Sony playstation controller does exactly what it is supposed to. We have had them for almost 3 years and they are just now getting to the point of needing new ones out of daily use. They are rechargeable and wireless. Synced right up to our play station 3 with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: With honest prices like this, I don't want to even give the ...
customer_reviews.text: With honest prices like this, I don't want to even give the Walmarts of the world more money than needed. This is the real deal controller but for less money. Amazon helps in a big way. Capitalism has allowed the middleman and manufacturer to charge whatever price point they wanted for a long time. It's our turn to take our buying power and put it in the right place
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best Play Station Wireless Controller!!
customer_reviews.text: My purchase of the DualShock 3 Wireless Controller - Red, from Game Hits Game Store trading on Amazon.com as GameHits was great! The Red DualShock 3 Wireless Controller for Play Station is absolutely the BEST CONTROLLER made!! I would definitely buy another one again, and I would definitely buy from this Seller, GameHits; they sell quality merchandise and they had the very best price!! They sold it for $36.95 + $3.99 Shipping, total of $40.94, Brand New. It was packaged safe, to protect it from damage during shipping! Definitely will buy from GameHits again!! Thanks so much GameHits!!
customer_reviews.author: Danna S. Drury

customer_reviews.title: Never can have enough controllers...
customer_reviews.text: Well, yes you can, but a red one works well to help everyone remember who's is who's with multi-player gaming. As with other Sony PlayStation Dualshock controllers, I find it works well, the vibration (as long as the setting is on) is enough to have your attention and give a since of participation more so than a plain controller. I like the color, I like the performance and I still like my PS3, so I think it was a very good buy. Thanks for reading and have a nice day.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pring

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always do the move you just controlled
customer_reviews.text: My son said that this controller works most of the time, but skips at times, meaning during some of the moves he tries to make in different games are not read by the controller. He has no problems with his original PS3 controllers, but with this one you'll push a button at times and the player on the screen does not do the move you just controlled. Be careful when choosing this one unless you have a child who doesn't mind missing moves while they play. :)
customer_reviews.author: Celle

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only have one controller and its starting to go so I ordered another. Technically they are supposed to be exactly the same except the colour but for some reason I can't fathom, it just doesn't feel or act quite as well. Let's say the first one I had was a ten out of ten, this one is a 9 out of ten. Still really, really good but not perfect. Worth the money and no real complaints but I still have a nagging feeling it could/should be better.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Witch

customer_reviews.title: controllers do not work!
customer_reviews.text: i needed another wireless controller for when friends come over. it arrived brand new sealed in box and all. i went to plug it into my PS3 using the USB wire to sync it. they lights just blinked for a few seconds, then turned off. i tried this repeatedly. each with the same result. live and learn. defective item. i'll spring the extra $$ and just buy one at Gamestop. at least i'll know it will work. i'm never ordering wireless controllers from here again. i'll do all my usual online shopping here lol but never again for wireless controller. i learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: mikeymizfit

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what it's supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: This is the actual controller made by Sony, not a third party, and that's what you really should always get. Third party controllers tend to have calibration issues amongst other things. This arrived when it was supposed to, and does exactly what it's supposed to do... and I got a red one! I bought this after I recently got a PS3 bundle so I can play local games with a friend, and guess what? It works perfectly. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Would give 5 stars if it held up better to heavy gaming
customer_reviews.text: Identical PS3 controller except for the color to the one that come with my PS3. Would give 5 stars if it held up better to heavy gaming. The analog sticks tend to wear out with aggressive game play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ole Red.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has lasted the ages. Still holds a full charge, and lasted my many years of first person shooters with out getting the left thumb stick with a permanent forward tilt due to running in Call of duty MW2, which my original contoller that came with the system suffered after using it to run all the time. Sony built them to be stronger and this is the result.
customer_reviews.author: True Love

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage and probably a knockoff. I read other reviews saying be wary of knockoffs, and I thought that this was the genuine article when I received it. I have had this barely 6 months and I have big problems with it. The left analog stick constantly scrolls up, making this unusable. It also takes minutes to connect to the PS3. Buy somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with other controllers; there's no replacing official Sony DS3's.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a broken DS3. There's no substitute for a Sony DS3 no matter how cheap, wired or wireless. Great quality, no input lag, nice color. Functions exactly like a regular DS3. And with the PS4 already out, got these somewhat on the cheap. All in all, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: WhiskeyNebula

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Chinese Copy
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the posting plus the pictures, I was a little confused because they showed a staged photo then just handheld photos from a phone. I wasn't planning on buying the controller at this point but the price was good for a "real" Dualshock 3 PS3 Controller. When I got the controller, on time not going to lie, it was just a copy of controller with poor battery life, stiff/stuck buttons and triggers. Honestly though the seller, I think just the general one, was actually really kind and gave me a refund for the controller and let me keep it. I'd rate the seller a 3 out of 5 but I'm giving the controller a 1.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all kinds of off-brand controllers but nothing works like the originals!
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great Portability and Game Use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in request by our grandson's wish list, this gift has proven to be exactly what was expected. He takes it back and forth between his parents homes for use with the Play Station 3, and he says it is perfect for his video interests. It is getting lots of use, and we hope it has the durability for his interests.
customer_reviews.author: Wes and Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Piece broke near the right Analog stick.
customer_reviews.text: Product was working good for about a month while playing NHL13 and COD Black ops 2. Never had any problems with Sony Ps3 controllers until i bought this one. Never even seen one break like this one. I don't know if this one was made with different material or something but a piece broke near the right analog stick. Can't really use it with those two games i mentioned. Apparently i can't replace the item. Please help me Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shdeed

customer_reviews.title: Just like the OEM controller, only the plastic seems much cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the OEM controller, but somehow the plastic feels different. A lot thinner and almost see through. No problems with it at all, just some musings on it. My original controllers were the thick, heavy guage plastic that you couldn't see the light through. This one the red light on top can be seen most of the way through the remote.
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: POS Beware
customer_reviews.text: Its a crap knockoff. Yes it looks 100% identical and feels that way too but upon use the left thumbstick sticks to the left. This is highly annoying when you are trying to play game like COD or battlefield as your guy wont stay still. I tried to return it but the seller only gave me a $5 refund. Stay away and but a used one from gamestop if you really need to save money.
customer_reviews.author: J Lord

customer_reviews.title: It's from Sony so of course it works.
customer_reviews.text: It's a Sony product so of course it works which is great. My husband plays Capcom vs. Marvel religiously and goes through a few controllers a year so this was one of many controllers I've bought. He likes the color since it's red plastic not a red coating, meaning the color won't rub off.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I did not get mine from sony, i believe the distributor changed since i bought it. It now says sony so your controller might be ok. Do not buy from anyone but sony. You will find controllers that are half the price, they are fake china knock offs and do not charge correctly. The knobs are stiff making it impossible to play any game that requires precise control. youve been warned
customer_reviews.author: J. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing controller and love the color
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up as my original controllers for my PS3 (I have the first edition 60gb PS3) weren't performing as they should, from being dropped etc so I was in need of a new controller. Must say that the controller is made rather cheaply compared to the originals but the control is amazing. Love the rumble faction and I do love the color. Besides the quality of controller, I'd say this is a definite plus when it comes to all your PS3 or even PS2 games.
customer_reviews.author: A. John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect controller - love the red too!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this direct from Amazon for a decent-enough price. I like the slightly darker red color and it works perfectly of course, it's new and Sony branded. It's a quality controller and I love the cordless design! It sure beats PS2 generation after-market cordless controllers I bought for $50 each and they were horrid, heavy, and unusable. Great engineering and light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany CherryBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Classic PS3 controller. & the RED avoids losing it so much
customer_reviews.text: I decided to switch it up and get a colored controller. The controller is like every other PS3 controller: reliable, durable and comfortable to use. So, no surprise there. The added benefit of the color wasn't apparent to me until I lost it: I found it a lot faster than I would have the stock Black controller. So, big plus there.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color of the controller (Go Pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my army buddy overseas, as he had some friends in the base, but no extra controllers to let them play games with each other when they were off duty. Loved the color of the controller (Go Pack!) and prompt shipping as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jack H

customer_reviews.title: A new controller in an awesome color
customer_reviews.text: It's great to see Sony come out with different color controllers that are first party peripherals. This arrived as a special treat for me and my fiancee since we were in dire need of a third controller to go along with our PS3. This fits perfectly with the other 2 that we have (one black, the other one blue). I think next time I'll get a silver one or the pink one. Love this controller!
customer_reviews.author: Integra

customer_reviews.title: A Standard I refuse to expect from playstation
customer_reviews.text: Sell the printer cheap and overcharge for the ink. I refuse to think that $40 is a fair price for a replacement controller. If im paying that much i expect better build quality. I dropped this once from 3 feet onto a thin cover rug and I already hear things rattling inside. Improve build quality or reduce the price. Most likely they will do neither. I gave this 3 stars because knockoffs still fail to compete.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: It's a fake.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake, it comes in some pretty convincing packaging and it looks official but it is not. I have several official Sony PS3 controllers and this one does not feel or operate like one. On the back where the usual FCC ID and other information is at it has a box that shows Complies with IDA Standards... I cant find anything online about this. I wouldn't recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, but the design could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this gamepad to use it on a PS3, but to carry it around with my laptop for gaming on-the-go. It's a pretty good gamepad in many respects, but the triggers just blow the way they are. I'm gonna buy some of those trigger extensions to make it more comfortable. Other than that, it's a pretty decent gamepad overall.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: good with some odd bits
customer_reviews.text: It works, which is expected, but when you turn it on and the light at the top turns on to say which player number you are you can see the light through the plastic on the frontnpanel. Makes it feel cheap if the plastic molding of the body is thin enough to shine a light through. The blue one I got doesn't allow this extra light through which makes me think this is a red only oddity.
customer_reviews.author: Bunch

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever play games without it?
customer_reviews.text: I love my red controller. It keeps a longgggg charge, too. I charge it up with the standard controller cord, whether my PS3 is on or off. When fully charged, the light stops blinking (otherwise it blinks while charging). This is very nice! Oh, and the system gives me a warning when the charge is low - even while playing a game! I do not know how I ever used my PS3 without it!
customer_reviews.author: RJ the Great Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Pic is misleading...
customer_reviews.text: The controller is a dull, boring, pale red. Like, the most generic red color you can imagine. It looks nothing like in this picture. I thought the red would be ruby red, with a glimmer. Just like the blue controller. But this is a just plain ugly red. Had I known it would be red red, and not the awesome red as seen in the pic. I never would have gotten this. Beware the crappy red controller. Get a blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Yoink

customer_reviews.title: Dualshock 3 wireless Controller
customer_reviews.text: For my son who goes through these pretty quickly since he lets his three young kids play with him. He has always gotten the refurbished ones and they have lasted pretty long, but since I couldn't find any I decided to get him a new one. He was very happy to pick the color (he loves red) and he promises to not let the kids touch this one. LOL. I will get him another soon, so he can share.
customer_reviews.author: ml

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Your run of the mill Sony Dualshock 3 controller, but it works like you'd expect it to. It's a good build and this version IS NOT A FAKE OR A KNOCKOFF. Well, at least mine weren't (I bought two.) It has a nice color, good buttons (not tough to push or too "sunken" in the controller) and analog sticks (not too lose). There wasn't any rattling within my controllers and they also have great charge time for hours of play. I have had no trouble getting them to turn on and work with my PS3 either and they have excellent range. Overall a typical but quality PS3 controller by Sony. A definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Just what you would expect!
customer_reviews.text: This controller is made by playstation and that means you can expect the quality of playstation. The controller works just as the normal controller that you get when you buy your playstation. The only difference is the texture of the controller. It isn't as smooth as the normal black controller, but it doesn't seem to make a difference when you are playing. If you need another controller this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: D&A Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Quality, no cable included.
customer_reviews.text: Standard PS3 controller, Iv'e always preferred the build quality of OEM Controllers. Only complaint is that it does not come with a usb cable, I had to purchase separately  Im using it with motioninjoy software on a PC, works great. Works with bluetooth adapter
customer_reviews.author: croak

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: When I received it at first I thought it was new because of the package even though i knew it was used but I discovered that the ps button seems to be mashed in a little and that it cuts off at unexpected times and it also doesn't have a long charged life like the remote that came with my PS3 but I got what I payed for
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great quality controller
customer_reviews.text: Great quality controller! Sadly I bought this only months before PS4 came out so I hardly used it before selling it with my PS3. Great controller and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After one time use it stipped charging, unfortunately I was using intermittently and not able to return it now!
customer_reviews.author: Sumit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Dualshock 3, now with more flavors.
customer_reviews.text: This dualshock is just as good as the original black ones, others claiming these are cheap are plain wrong. It's heavy, sturdy, and ready for punishment. The 1-4 controller # lights glow through on my red controller very strongly around the plastic, but that's to be expected from an overpowered LED. I've dropped, sat on and played with this thing for 3 months now. All is well. Typical Dualshock, doesn't disappoint. Never going back to 6-axis ever.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Jenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Always go with the name brand on controllers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Always go with the name brand on controllers. I bought an off brand just before this one and the buttons didn't work. Will never try and save money when buying controllers again!
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Red...
customer_reviews.text: After one of my controllers began to malfunction, I had to find a replacement. I almost went with a generic replacement but I decided to shell out a few extra bucks to get the genuine Sony brand. I do not regret this decision. This controller is sleek and bold, and looks great with any other color controller. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michael V

customer_reviews.title: Loved the deep red color
customer_reviews.text: I received this controller in brand new packaging like you would get from the store. It worked perfectly good and is very sturdy for kids who just like tossing it. The price is way better than in store prices anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Works great on PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mainly due to the Bluetooth feature. With the right software (MotioninJoy [make sure to get the offline version]), it pairs well with my laptop and I am able to easily configure it to be used with Playstation/Playstation 2 emulators. Being a genuine Sony product, it has the right weight and feel, and all the buttons and sticks work and respond as expected. I don't really play console games, so I could only speculate on its functionality with an actual PS3, but I can attest to its compatibility with a PC. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent V. Marshburn

customer_reviews.title: Sony works best
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few aftermarket controllers (generic) because I hate spending $40-60 on a controller, but after the hassle (some work and some don't) I decided to just dish out the extra and buy brand name. So glad I did because Sony works the best. There is no delay in response time and the battery life is amazing. I'm done trying cheaper controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Shara Meade

customer_reviews.title: KINDLE FIRE HD SUCKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'M ON MY SECOND ONE FROM AMAZON AND THIS ONE ISN'T ANY BETTER THAN FIRST. I'VE HAD IT ABOUTY 4 MONTHS NOW AND IT WON'T HOLD A CHARGE. WAS USING IT THIS MORNING AND IT DIED. IT HAS BEEN CHARGING FOT NEARLY 2 HRS AND IS ONLY 5% CHARGED!!! BUY FROM SOME OTHER MANUFACTURER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: fightingterp

customer_reviews.title: Dead
customer_reviews.text: Died within months of lite use. this looks like a real PS3 controller but is some unknown maker and they will not replace it, or repair it even though you contact them within the 90 day warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD ITEM
customer_reviews.text: LET ME JUST SAY THAT THERE IS NOT ANYTHING BETTER THAN THE FEEL OF AN SONY BRAND PS3 REMOTE. I HAVE TRIED MANY OTHERS ONLY TO FIND THAT THERE ARE SMALL DIFFERENCES IN THE OVERALL SHAPE AND FEEL OF THE BUTTONS THAT JUST DETRACT SO MUCH FROM THE GAMING EXPERIENCE. WOULD RECOMMEND SPENDING THE EXTRA ON THE NAME BRAND REMOTE OVER AN OFF BRAND ANY DAY OF THE WEEK.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Paul

customer_reviews.title: Controller is great. I wouldnt buy it in a used condition
customer_reviews.text: Controller is great. I wouldnt buy it in a used condition. After a few months in used condition, it starts having problems. Buttons won't work, joy sticks start sticking, even playing games, somehow the joy stick will do everything on its own when you aren't doing anything. From now on, I'll buy everything new. Other than that, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Gault

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Have had nothing but issues trying to.connect to the ps4. Worked for 2 weeks then quit.
customer_reviews.author: Lolarabbit

customer_reviews.title: The Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Deep Red PS3 controller from Direct Distributor through Amazon. It's the real deal. I was concerned because of all the fakes out there, but this one was legit. Normally, I would've bought something like this from a retail store, but nobody has the red controllers anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mudpappy

customer_reviews.title: I can finally play 2 players when family/friends come over.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool controller, it does not come with a USB chord which is really stupid, but I knew that before buying it. I like the color, and it is in fact a Sony product, and looks just like the one that my PS3 came with. It can be used for the PS2 as well; I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daveydoh

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: I was a little taken back at first. I was under the assumption that I was getting a brand new controller. When it arrived, it was not even in the original packaging, like a new one. It was in a cardboard protector wrapped in bubble wrap. . . ? Whether it is brand new or not - I can't tell. Visually, it appears to be new and the analog sticks feel tight, so I'm assuming it is. I haven't had any issues or complaints with it. I just wish it would've been in the original packaging so I knew it was indeed brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Northwoodsboy72

customer_reviews.title: Look out for counterfeiters.
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was definitely counterfeit. It was very convincing until, after one day of use, the left analogue stick lost 70% of its pushback. When I went to Gamestop looking for another controller, I found a genuine Sony product and the difference was as clear as night and day. The controller I bought here was a bright red, while the real article was a deep red, and didn't feel as cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Whitebread

customer_reviews.title: Dualshock 3 wireless controller - Red
customer_reviews.text: Amazon processed this order quickly and it arrived within a few days (sooner than expected). Had to sync the controller using the USB cable the first time (not sure if that is just my PS3 or a normal process) but haven't had any issues since. Controller works great and battery life is great as well. I am now looking at purchasing the silver one as well. No regrets and I saved $10.00. Can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: USN Chop

customer_reviews.title: It does not really make much sense, but I play way better with this than the Black Controller.
customer_reviews.text: It does not really make much sense, but I play way better with this than the Black Controller. It should not matter, the only difference I can think of is that this one is fresh and works better, but still, I play batter with the new Red one than the old Black one... Pure Pwnage !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Evereklian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the controller
customer_reviews.text: Im disappointed in the feel and the performance of this controller. I have had this controller for over a month and side by side comparison when I got it I could tell a difference in the ps3 controller that comes with the system and this one. Right off the bat you can feel this controller is a lot lighter it feels like if you were to drop it, it might break and the buttons and sticks don't feel like they are going to last to long, I've already had the x button stick a couple of times. The final thing is the battery and the charge it holds, my stock controller lasts twice as long as this controller does.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Haddock Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Sony Brand!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not Sony brand! It is a ps3 controller, But it is not the same a Sony brand! IT IS A FAKE!!! The controller does not perform like a Sony brand controller would!!
customer_reviews.author: HEMI ORANGE

customer_reviews.title: Good one, but weaker baterry
customer_reviews.text: I really likes this joystick, but beware - this is ONLY 300 Ma (the original black one is more), so you will have to CHARGE it more OFTEN!! Other than that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Y.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Dualshock Controller.
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars because something like this either works or does not. For a PlayStation controller, it's fantastic. Good heft, bluetooth, rumbles when you get hit. It does everything it's supposed to and it's durable enough to survive the few accidental drops onto a wood floor that it's been subjected to.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: DualShock 3 Wireless Controller
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived promptly and was in original factory wrappings. It works great and is even less expensive than you can get at your local retail markets. I have used it for a couple of months now and it is identical except for the color to the controller which came with the PS3. It is motion sensitive with force feed back. If I ever need another one I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hairywolf

customer_reviews.title: No of Sony Quality as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Though they refunded the money quickly, and the price was just a little under the regular cost of a real sony stick, it was not... The L# and R3 sticks were very stiff like the other after market sticks.
customer_reviews.author: L. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: New Real PS3 controller
customer_reviews.text: Brand new Real PS3 controller so glad I bought it. Its hard to find a real one these days and mine works great I'd buy again from this shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Max H.

customer_reviews.title: Not so Shocking....
customer_reviews.text: This controller works as it should! The same form, fit, and function as the DualShock 2 controllers, except that this is for the PS3. Love the red color! Didn't come with a charging cord, and I don't intend to buy one. Simply use the one that comes with the PS3 - and alternate the charging cycles between your two controllers. I'm 6'1", 250lbs...big hands...so I wish that the controller were bigger... Like the aftermarket ones made by Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Garey

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Battery didn't last long enough to play wireless mode. Besides the feeling of the controller when using it was kind of hard, black or write controllers have softer buttons and joysticks.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar MCC

customer_reviews.title: Did the job for the price. Did not feel authentic though
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for the price. Did not feel authentic though, but didn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: it's nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and it works fine so far, however I was disappointed that it didn't come with a charging cord. Not sure if that is clearly stated and I just didnt see it. Regardless, for a retail price of $54.99, you would think it came with one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berges

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Controller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller so I would have an extra one charged and ready to go. Not much to really say...it's a Sony product so the build quality is top-notch and you can get them in a variety of colors. I would recommend an extra controller to any PS3 owner and Amazon had the best prices around.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rosswaag

customer_reviews.title: Good red controller
customer_reviews.text: Good controller, it feels good in hand. I got this as my second controller in red color, it looks great! at the beginning I didn't get how to connect it and pair it to my ps3 but worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mario J.

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: If this controller is not counterfeit I would be very surprised. The feel is off, it feels much lighter than the original, the buttons are uncooperative, it disconnects from the system unlike the original controller that came with the PS3. If they are selling a Sony Controller, new, for less than $60.00 It's too good to be true. The service of the seller was great. not sure if they knew about the product. Just be wary and keep the box and packaging, unlike my husband, so you can send it back.
customer_reviews.author: jirene725

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but original
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was intrigued by cheaper alternative non-original PS3 wireless controller. Some of the are having a good rating also from the consumer. But then I remember the rule of thumb for purchasing, that is actually applicable everywhere in life --"cheap thing no good, good thing no cheap". Purchasing original controller means better quality, feels great in your hand, the battery will last longer (almost a week, compare to the cheaper alternative that normally you will have to charge them everyday).
customer_reviews.author: smellycat2013

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing I think
customer_reviews.text: I really don't think this controller is as good as the original black one I received with the PS3, even though I bought this directly from Sony's Amazon page. Its lighter, clumsier, with a shorter batter life even though it turns itself off when not used for a long time (such as during a movie)
customer_reviews.author: T. Khetia

customer_reviews.title: works just like it should
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a new one since the other one got used up. Arrived fast, works just like it should, except for a bit of a dead zone, while first moving the joysticks. Manually recalibrating may fix this issue. But still a great, (so far) reliable controller.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Harper

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The controller I received was garbage. I litteraly can't use it because the right stick felt cheap and was waaay to sensitive. I've been playing FPS's for years and they're just not playable with this. I don't know if they make cheaply made controllers, but some how this one slipped through. The one I've had for 4 years is much, much better.
customer_reviews.author: jablob

customer_reviews.title: Its a sony
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a PS3 controller made by Sony other than it works better than any of the after market ones. I like the Red it sets it off from my friends controllers (no confusion on who's it is) it stays charged a reasonable amount of time and feels solid just like the black one that comes with the PS3
customer_reviews.author: Yajr

customer_reviews.title: red if you like the color
customer_reviews.text: for those who like red, this is the controller for you on ps4
customer_reviews.author: Stevienix

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: You can buy these cheap on Amazon during certain times during the year. I always have them on my wish list. Once they drop below $40, I pick one up. As an adult, I wear one of these out once or twice a year. They're not very tough to large hands. But love my PS3 football and shooter games.
customer_reviews.author: Brandan Schultz

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than a knock-off!
customer_reviews.text: I stupily purchased a knock-off set and was miserable with it, so I sucked up the full cost and purchased this one. I really wish I had saved my $20 on the other one because this controller makes gaming so easy. All of the buttons and joy sticks are smoothe and consistant. ALWAYS PURCHASE THE REAL THING!!
customer_reviews.author: alaskachik17

customer_reviews.title: Terrible remote
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product its like an on off switch when you move the analog stick cant even play mw3 with it terrible buy! When you try to move a little to the right it doesnt move until it runs to the right Or any direction really
customer_reviews.author: Snake Pliskin

customer_reviews.title: L2 and L3 malfunctioning right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: This controller was obviously refurbished. The L2 paddle sticks and the L3 stick is loose. Very dissappointed :-(
customer_reviews.author: Bravo Event Productions

customer_reviews.title: O
customer_reviews.text: This controller is of less quality than the controller that came with system. I found the whole controller buying experience confusing. Wal-Mart had 2 controllers: One $54 and one $44 that looked identical. Not sure what the difference could have been. But, I expected this controller to be of the same quality as my other one.
customer_reviews.author: repeat_offender75

customer_reviews.title: the rating dont apply
customer_reviews.text: it wouldve been a good remote but the spring in 1 side of the button#2 sticks & now i have to return it & scince the fault lies in the remote, i have to pay for return shipping which isnt rite. if its a defective item the seller should send a postage pd label. but if i didnt like the item then the fee should lye on the buyer.
customer_reviews.author: pennie conley

customer_reviews.title: it came on time and it looked great.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this remote as a gift, it came on time and it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: S

product_meta.title: PlayStation 3 Dualshock 3 Wireless Controller (Red)
feature_bullets: The only Bluetooth controller for the PS3 system;
Hours of comfortable game play with ergonomically designed grips;
Feel every hit, crash, and explosion with hand-vibrating DUALSHOCK response
Truly intuitive game play through the motion sensing SIXAXIS technology;
Play wirelessly with up to seven friends;

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,195 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
specifications.Department: VIDEO GAME ACCESS -> VIDEO GAME ACCESSORIES
